TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomValidator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.BaseValidator

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供控制項，這個控制項可以對另一個控制項執行自訂驗證。

span.span: Provides a control that can perform custom validation against another control.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的行為即會相同與Web 伺服器控制項。This class behaves identically to the Web server control. 開發人員可以選擇要用於驗證自己通用語言執行階段委派。Developers can choose their own common language runtime delegate to use for validation. 根據預設，表單上的控制項驗證程式上引發事件時要執行驗證表單提交給伺服器表單。By default, controls on a form raise validator events on the form to perform validation when the form is submitted to the server. 若要停用自動驗證，請設定屬性控制項`false`。To disable automatic validation, set the property on the controls to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查是否在使用者將放入值控制項是否為偶數。The following example checks whether the value that a user places into the control is an even number. 如果值為偶數，則頁面是有效的。If the value is an even number, then the page is valid. 如果不是，頁面不是有效的而顯示屬性。If not, the page is not valid, and the displays the property. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法已向此事件，它就稱為值是屬性。If a method is registered with this event, it is called with the value of the property. 此事件處理常式傳回時，才會成功驗證`true`。Validation succeeds only if this event handler returns `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何捕捉加入邏輯，驗證頁面的事件。The following example demonstrates how to trap the event to add logic to validate the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCustomValidatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCustomValidatorSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]
